projects.title: Sample project
projects.body: This is a sample project page for development.

projects.title: Solar System
projects.body: Solar System: using translate(), push(), rotate(), pop() functions in p5.js.

projects.title: Particles
projects.body: Particles that fall when the mouse is dragged and bounce on the ground.

projects.title: Particles with collision detection
projects.body: When particles pass through the box they change color and become red.

projects.title: Plinko
projects.body: Plinko game: random balls fall from the top when pressing any key on the keyboard.

projects.title: Catapult
projects.body: Two blue balls interact with the white bar which likes teeter totter.

projects.title: Angry Birds Clone
projects.body: An angry birds clone game: remove all of the green boxes.
